title: Uzak Åžehir
overview: Alya Albora arrives in the Albora lands of Mardin from Canada with her late husband's body and her five-year-old son, fulfilling his final wish. However, there is no return or escape from Albora. Cihan Albora, the head of the Albora family, may not remain indifferent to Alya's struggles, but he refuses to let her leave with her child. As Alya faces the dark past, hidden secrets, and the realities of the region, she finds herself in a fierce battle with her husband's family.
